amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 118-516 to change the new crowdfunding exemption from $75 million to $5 million.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to change the new crowdfunding exemption from $75 million to $5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Casar amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 209 (Roll no. 223).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Casar amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 209 (Roll no. 223).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
